description: "This early 17th century map of Asia by Jodocus Hondius was based on the earlier work of the Gerard Mercator. Hondius republished Mercator’s ‘Atlas’, with additional maps, which was instrumental in re-establishing Mercator’s reputation."
label: "Les Îles Moluques, tres exactement representées selon les plus nouvelles Observations des meilleurs Geographes"
